thread.title: BRIEF-Flight Centre Travel Group Says Court Imposed Penalties Of $12.5 Mln On Co

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Flight Centre Travel Group Says Court Imposed Penalties Of $12.5 Mln On Co

organizations.name: brief-flight centre travel group says court imposed penalties of $12.5 mln on co
reuters) - flight centre travel group ltd

text:
April 4 (Reuters) - Flight Centre Travel Group Ltd:
* ‍FULL FEDERAL COURT IMPOSED TOTAL PENALTIES OF $12.5 MILLION ON CO IN RELATION TO TEST CASE INITIATED IN 2012​
* PENALTY WILL NOT AFFECT FLT’S MARKET GUIDANCE FOR FY18 OF AN UNDERLYING PROFIT BEFORE TAX OF BETWEEN $360M AND $385M.
* PENALTY WILL BE INCLUDED IN CO’S STATUTORY RESULTS FOR THE YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
